definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
(literary) to inform (the public)/to give clear instructions/public announcement (from higher authorities)
to circulate (a protest or call to arms)/to promulgate
to dispatch an army/to send troops
to put down a revolt/to pacify a rebellion
land tax/money and grain (given as tax or tribute)
(in ancient times) a man old enough for corvée or military service
to go on a punitive expedition
